title: Open Beta Client
body: I play on EUNE. I got patch 6.22 (preseason) a few days ago, but i didn't get any prompt for downloading and installing the new client. I think it's because open beta didn't start yet in my region. Does anybody know the answer?

replies.body: The open beta is currently available to OCE only.  We aim to have more regions access to it as well.  Hang tight until then!
